O S1st October, 1941.WARCABINET.COMMITTEE ON JjiOQHOMIC ASPECTS of reconstruction PROBLEMS.Composition and Terms of Reference.(Reference W.P.(G)(41) 24).1. The Prime Minister has approved the appointmentof a Committee with the following terms of reference:-"To consider and advise upon economic problems in connection with the preparation of reconstruction plans."2. The Committee has been constituted as followsThe Minister without Portfolio (Chairman),The Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs,The Chancellor of the Exchequer,The Minister of Labour and National Service,The President of the Board of Trade,The Secretary of the Department of Overseas3, Other Ministers will be invited to attend, or berepresented at, meetings of the Committee at which mattersof particular concern to their Departments are to be dealtwith..Trade,Sir G. Chrystal,Secretary.(Signed) E.E. BRIDGES.Secretary of the War Cabinet.Great George Street, S.W.1.
